adjectives.description: jerksome (comparative more jerksome, superlative most jerksome)

entries.meaning: Indicative of quick, rapid movements; jerky.
examples: With females jolting up and down, upon no springs — except those of jerksome curiosity — conduct of this character was rude in the extreme.

adjectives.description: jerksome (comparative more jerksome, superlative most jerksome)

entries.meaning: Characteristic of a jerk, or obnoxious person.
examples: That was mighty jerksome of you.
